 1997 1 SUBMIT *Trophies are allotted in each quiz chapter, when a player achieves full marks. Congratulations you received %s Gems Gems Continue Finish Retry
Next You Failed Success You did it Try Again Risk It All Mr. Unreliable CHAPTERS SCORE Incorrect Correct Quiz Results Collect Trophy OK ON Sounds Music Settings Don\'t Show Back GO BACK PROCEED Close Results Image Welcome to Quizpert Brief User Guide Settings Menu - Change music and sound state. Rules Menu - Find and learn rules about Quizpert. Statistics Menu - Check trophies won and highscores. About Menu - Find out about the developer etc. Back Button - Navigates to previous screen. Home Button - Navigates to main screen. Store Button - Navigates to the gem store. Settings Button - Navigates to settings menu. Store Credits Music Credits No, thanks Video starting in %d… Watch this video and receive one free powerup.

SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETE THE PREVIOUS CHAPTER OR UNLOCK THIS CHAPTER WITH 500 GEMS. YOU DON\'T HAVE ENOUGH GEMS TO UNLOCK THIS CHAPTER. CLICK THE GEM ICON BELOW TO BUY GEMS. YOU MUST UNLOCK THE PREVIOUS CHAPTERS IN SEQUENCE, BEFORE UNLOCKING THIS CHAPTER. YOU CAN PURCHASE THE PREVIOUS CHAPTERS WITH GEMS OR SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETE THEM IN ORDER.
